text: Jesús Mirabal Leal (born 1948 in Pinar del Río Province) is a former Cuban decathlete. He won the Central American and Caribbean Games in 1970 and 1974 and took bronze medals at the Pan American Games in 1971 and 1975. He was the first Cuban decathlete to break the 7000 point barrier, and eventually established his national record at 7582 points. ==External links== *GBR Athletics * Category:1948 births Category:Cuban decathletes Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1971 Pan American Games Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1975 Pan American Games Category:Living people Category:Pan American Games medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Cuba Category:Central American and Caribbean Games gold medalists for Cuba Category:Competitors at the 1970 Central American and Caribbean Games Category:Competitors at the 1974 Central American and Caribbean Games Category:Central American and Caribbean Games medalists in athletics
title: Jesús Mirabal
